alert.note: Alert for Holt (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 07 at 9:29PM CDT until June 08 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN HOLT COUNTY... At 929 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Craig, or near Mound City, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Mound City, Craig, Bigelow, Corning and Indian Cave State Park. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 83 and 98. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
